Name: Selfless Heroes
About the game: Seize control of a team of selfless heroes sharing the same artificial intelligence. Design their AI and get them to work together to solve puzzles. Test your algorithm, optimize it, and emerge victorious from the dungeon! If you love logic and puzzles, you’ll love this challenging game. But there’s no need to be a programmer, just learn as you go, and discover the wonderful world of parallel programming, all to a background of soothing music. 63 puzzles of increasing difficulty 5 bosses to put your logic to the test Over 30 hours of play Learn to code like a real programmer Already a programmer? Well, optimize your code and challenge yourself to achieve all the secondary objectives! Stuck at a level? Ask the community for help on Discord.
